channel.title: Burgers on Felipe Brunet
channel.description: Recent content in Burgers on Felipe Brunet

item.title: Bitcoin Ecommerce Site
item.description: bitpointburger.cl Great smashed burgers in Pichilemu, Chile. Site made with Wordpress, Woocommerce and very few plugins, to maximize speed and responsiveness. Includes traditional payment gateways and also Bitcoin Lightning payments with the LN Pagos Latam plugin.
